bibl.title: Dispatch from du Verge to J. C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

correspAction.persName: Davis, J. C. Bancroft (John Chandler Bancroft), 1822-1907

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.p:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
S.W.C. Africa

L. de R. du Verge
To State Depart.

Encloses
Despatch of same and departure of Vice Consul Robert S.Newton

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
at St. Paul de Loanda S.W.C. Africa
June 13th, 1882

div1.p: Sir I have the honor to state that I arrived at my post in England On the 12th day of June 1882 and Entered upon my official duty this date, and that Mr. Robert S. Newton my vice consul leave by steamer tomorrow by reason of failing Health.

closer.salute:
I have the honor
to be Sir
Your obedient servant
closer.signed:
L. de R. du Verge
U.S. Consul
